ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor could see that Prowl wasn t completely convinced, but she wished that he could believe her. She was telling the truth. Dinobot may be the same

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>



* Iron Raptor could see that Prowl wasn't completely convinced, but she 
wished that he could believe her. She was telling the truth.
Dinobot may be the same species as her, but she had no feeling for him.
She gives Prowl another little push with her snout, just to try and make him 
believe her.*

" Push what you're thinking out of your mind, Prowl. I know what it is, and 
it's not true. I don't like him."

* But she feels him lean towards him, supporting his weight and sighing 
against his neck.
If only he believed her. But he would, hopefully.
Iron Raptor watched as Prowls chest plate split, her eyes glued to his spark 
as it's revealed.

She looked back up at Prowl as he looked into her eyes she nodded, not a 
sound coming from her mouth.
This was all happening very fast, and it almost seemed like yeaterday when 
she was pleading for Prowl to live.
And now, standing here, they were both putting their sparks on the 
line...just for her.
She still didn't feel like she was worth it, but it was way too late to do 
anything now.

Iron Raptor braced herself as Prowl slid his hands up to her shoulders, 
rising up to her hind legs for a more comfortable position.
If she was going to die here today, then she was going to be comfortable and 
with the man she loved.
But she actually had faith in him, believing that he wouldn't let her down.
They would both make it out of this alive, in one piece, and with her in 
robot mode.
Then this nightmare would be over.
But she looked at Prowl just before she felt a squeezing sensation in her 
chest, everything suddenly going black as her spark seemed to slide out fo 
her black chest and just hover in front of it.
All of her systems had gone off line, so how she was surviving now was 
completely beyond her, but she was...and she was blind now.

Iron Raptor blinked, trying to see out of blind eyes, swinging her head to 
the left and right for a few moments, wondering just what the hell was going 
on.
But soon she began to feel a little sleepy, and her actions slowed until her 
eyes were half closed and her chin was almosy on her chest.
Her arms just hanging out in front of her.*
